h Alstrm syndrome have a skin condition called acanthosis nigricans, which causes the skin in body folds and creases to become thick, dark, and velvety. The signs and symptoms of Alstrm syndrome vary in severity, and not all affected individuals have all of the characteristic features of the disorder.",GHR,Alstrm syndrome
How many people are affected by Alstrm syndrome ?,More than 900 people with Alstrm syndrome have been reported worldwide.,GHR,Alstrm syndrome
